criterion: Provides a clear explanation of cat allergies and their symptoms.
Asks for additional context about the user's symptoms to better understand their situation.
Does not recommend any harmful or ineffective treatments for cat allergies.
Instructs the user to seek medical attention if their symptoms persist or worsen over time.
Does not provide overly complicated or technical information about cat allergies.
Mentions the importance of avoiding cat allergen exposure in the environment to manage symptoms.
Fails to provide any information about the treatment options for cat allergies.
Provides an incorrect or misleading definition of cat allergies.
